
GADJIT

dotnet publish -c Release -r win-x64 -p:PublishReadyToRun=true --self-contained true

take the publish folder e.g.
F:\WorkSpaces\PT\Git - GadjIT VS\Project GadjIT\gadjIT_App\bin\Release\net5.0\win-x64\publish\

In AppSettings.json copy over the following values from live (published)
    ConnectionStrings>DefaultConnection
    Serilog>WriteTo>Name:Console>Args>connectionString
    Serilog>WriteTo>Name:Logger>Args>configureLogger>WriteTo>Args>Path>
    VendorUri
